title: Q&A AI Knowledge Graph, Airbus
description: Developed AI-driven knowledge graphs to enhance decision-making and data retrieval for industrial applications. Integrated generative AI solutions using LangChain, MLflow, and GCP Vertex AI.

title: Civil Aviation Authority (DGAC)
description: Managed the relocation of a communication system at the DGAC (VCS). Reorganized the workspace to optimize 15% of the working time, improving efficiency.

title: DECART Project
description: Conducted strategic analysis on future industrial skills needs through targeted surveys. Provided data-driven insights to optimize educational training programs in 6 universities across 5 countries.

title: Entrepreneurship
description: Designed a ride-sharing mobile application, applying data analysis for market insights. Led UX/UI development and business intelligence reporting to enhance user engagement and achieve $10k in revenue.
